attributes.action: sack David Blanchflower from the MPC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite being American and being familiar with the failings of the federal reserve banks efforts to curtail inflation with interest rate cuts, he peddles the same medicine for the UK. Inflation is in serious danger of becoming embedded in the UK economy and his removal from the MPC will go some ways to protecting this country from the inflationary pressures now and in the future.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
